description: Manage WAF related metric statistics for AFD profile.

commands.name: az afd waf-log-analytic metric list
commands.summary: Get Waf related log analytics report for AFD profile.
commands.syntax:
az afd waf-log-analytic metric list --date-time-begin
                                    --date-time-end
                                    --granularity {P1D, PT1H, PT5M}
                                    --metrics
                                    --profile-name
                                    --resource-group
                                    [--actions]
                                    [--group-by]
                                    [--rule-types]
